sentences: Gabriela Anders (born March 17, 1972 in Buenos Aires) is an Argentine singer and pianist.
Gabriela Anders (born March 17, 1972 in Buenos Aires) is an Argentine singer and pianist. Anders started out on classical guitar, then studied piano at a conservatory in Buenos Aires.
In the U.S., she was influenced by jazz and listened to the music of Stan Getz, Dexter Gordon, and John Coltrane.
Her first album, Fantasia was released in 1996.
